document_data.mainbody:
Famryns Fine Oils was an oil-making business in Baldurs Gate during the 15 century DR.
Famryns produced various high-quality oils in the gnome-owned and human-operated workshop. It was linked by  merchants map to the Arthane Armory in Waterdeep, which bought "fire oil" to apply to newly made longswords and other weapons before sale.
